G

Game - Class in model
A Game object represents an instance of a Yahtzee game.
Game() - Constructor for class model.Game
 
game - Variable in class view.YahtzeeGUI
 
gameSpeedListener - Variable in class view.YahtzeeGUI.ControlPanel
 
getHand() - Method in class model.Score
Returns the hand for this score
getInstance() - Static method in class model.Dice
The Dice object implements the Singleton design pattern, and can therefore have only one instance of the class.
getInstance() - Static method in class model.Game
Returns the current instance of the Game object
getInstance() - Static method in class model.ScoreValidator
Returns the instance of the ScoreValidator
getLowerTotal() - Method in class model.ScoreCard
Returns the total of the lower seven elements on the ScoreCard: Three of a Kind, Four of a Kind, Full House, Small Straight, Large Straight, Yahtzee, Chance.

Returns the name of the strategy

getNumRolls() - Method in class model.Dice
Getter for the number of rolls in the current turn
getPlayers() - Method in class model.Game
Returns (by value) a list of Players.
getRoll() - Method in class model.Dice
Gets the current configuration (the current roll) of the dice
getScore() - Method in class model.Player
Getter for the Player's cumulative score
getScore() - Method in class model.Score
Returns the score for this hand
getScore(Hands) - Method in class model.ScoreCard
Returns the Score object for the corresponding hand
getScoreCard() - Method in class model.Player
Getter for the Player's ScoreCard.
getScoreTaken() - Method in class model.Score
Returns whether the score has been taken or not
getStatus() - Method in class model.Dice
Getter for the current status of the Dice, either READY, ROLLING, or OUT_OF_ROLLS.
getStatus() - Method in class model.Game
Gets the current Status of the Game
getStrategy() - Method in class model.PlayerIdentity
Getter for the strategy
getStrategyName() - Method in class model.Player
Getter for the string representation of the current Player's Strategy object
getStrategyPlaying() - Method in class model.Game
Returns whether the Strategy is currently playing a turn
getStrategyPlaySpeed() - Method in class model.Game
Returns the play speed (rather the timeout in milliseconds) for the Strategy
getUpperBonus() - Method in class model.ScoreCard
Returns the Upper Bonus value: 35 if the bonus can be taken (if the upper total is >= 63) or 0 if it cannot be taken.
getUpperTotal() - Method in class model.ScoreCard
Returns the total of the upper six elements on the ScoreCard: Ones, Twos, Threes, Fours, Fives, Sixes.
getYahtzeeBonus() - Method in class model.ScoreCard
Returns the Yahtzee Bonus value: +100 points for every additional Yahtzee rolled after the first Yahtzee has been scored.
